abstract: Ford Motor says it is in talks with Tencent, maker of WeChat messaging app, to develop messaging functions for its cars in China.
lead_paragraph: Ford said it was in talks with Tencent, maker of the popular WeChat messaging app, to develop messaging functions for the manufacturer’s cars in China.

headline.main: Tencent to Develop Chat App for Fords in China
headline.print_headline: Tencent to Develop Chat App for Fords in China

snippet: Ford said it was in talks with Tencent, maker of the popular WeChat messaging app, to develop messaging functions for the manufacturer’s cars in China.
